intro: Hieracium altinozlui, commonly known as the Altinozlu hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its daisy-like inflorescence, consisting of a central yellow disk surrounded by ray florets. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. It has hairy stems and leaves that are usually lance-shaped. Hieracium altinozlui is native to specific regions in Europe and is often found in alpine or subalpine areas.
